name: Searching in Chaos
description: My first ever 3D game inspired by the popular "I Spy" book series, where the reader is challenged to find small hidden everyday objects in a chaotic environment. All 3D modelling was done by myself except for the chair, which was obtained from Grand Rapids Chair co. gallery. Textures were from Sketchup Textures and Poliigon, and were edited with Materialize.
